name: Alex K.
about: I love trying out different cars.  I've never been in an accident and am a responsible, safe person.  I’m familiar with manual clutch/paddle shifters.   I’m not interested in racing/peeling out.I teach Argentine Tango dancing in Portland, OR.  My website is www.alextango.com
